New Records: Nicholas Pooran scored 98 runs, the highest score by a West Indies player in a men's T20 World Cup match
Obed McCoy took a three-wicket haul in the match
Key Match Events: Pooran hit a world record 36-run over in the powerplay
Afghanistan collapsed in the chase with key dismissals by McCoy
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies secured a spot in the Super Eight stage with a perfect record
Nicholas Pooran narrowly missed a century in the final over
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies recorded their highest total in a men's T20 World Cup match
The match had little bearing on the Super Eight seedings as both teams had already secured their spots
